segments.text: This is absolutely infuriating to watch!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How can someone be so utterly unobservant?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink is overflowing, water is everywhere, and she just keeps polishing that plate!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's beyond careless; it's practically negligent.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And those children are going to hurt themselves with that tipping stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Don't they teach basic awareness anymore?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is going to ruin the cabinets and the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe she hasn't felt the water soaking into her shoe.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole situation just makes my blood boil.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone needs to step in and take control of this chaotic kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sheer waste of water is also quite irritating.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a disaster waiting to happen, and it could all be so easily avoided.
segments.speaker: PAR
